thread.title: Comment on Predicted Manchester United starting XI vs CSKA Moscow by Anonymous
thread.title_full: Comment on Predicted Manchester United starting XI vs CSKA Moscow by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Comment on Predicted Manchester United starting XI vs CSKA Moscow by Anonymous
text:
Tweet 
It’s that time again: Manchester United starting XI prediction time. United head to the capital of Mother Russia to take CSKA Moscow to continue group stage play in the UEFA Champions League. 
Louis van Gaal has indicated that he won’t change much from Sunday when he selects the Manchester United first team Wednesday night (here’s more on that). 
Given how the win at Goodison Park was as impressive an effort as we’ve seen all season long, Van Gaal shouldn’t make a whole lot of changes. If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it, right? 
So here’s the Man United starting XI that we’re going with. Anthony Martial Ander Herrera Wayne Rooney Juan Mata Bastian Schweinsteiger Morgan Schneiderlin Marcos Rojo Phil Jones Chris Smalling Matteo Darmian De Gea 
As always, feel free to post your own Manchester United starting XI projection in the comments section below. And of course speak your mind on the formations and Manchester United starting XI predictions that you’ve already seen online. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. 
Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous radio and television talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone. Follow him on Twitter and Instagram
